title: Retail Traders Lashed by Crypto Rout After Wall Street Bet Big
description: Retail investors who piled into the Trump administration’s promised crypto paradise via Wall Street-approved funds are now learning an expensive lesson in market gravity.
content: Retail investors who piled into the Trump administration’s promised crypto paradise via Wall Street-approved funds are now learning an expensive lesson in market gravity.
